dialogueTree.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Again?! I can't believe this shit...."
dialogueTree.text: "Again?! I can't believe this shit..." He shakes his head, looking like he really is having trouble believing this *shit*.

links.title: You: ""Look, I just have to ask: are we f..."
links.text: "Look, I just have to ask: are we from the same police station?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I'm going to say... *no*. Just to..."
links.text: "I'm going to say... *no*. Just to see what you'll say to that. What do you say?"

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay?!""
links.text: "Okay?!"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Jean, he said okay, give it a rest.""
links.text: "Jean, he said okay, give it a rest."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Okay. I was clearly wrong. He is a..."
links.text: Okay. I was clearly wrong. He is a firefighter, male nurse, animal control agent -- something of that kind. Not a cop. Go on with your cop work. Don't let me stop you again.

links.title: You: ""Yeah. Probably not. I don't rememb..."
links.text: "Yeah. Probably not. I don't remember you from anywhere."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""God fucking shit..." He pinches th..."
links.text: "God fucking shit..." He pinches the root of his nose.

links.title: Empathy: "None of this is great news for him."
links.text: None of this is great news for him.

links.title: You: ""Let's talk more about that hypothe..."
links.text: "Let's talk more about that hypothetical Station 41 you mentioned."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, the Hypothetical Four-One. Yea..."
links.text: "Oh, the Hypothetical Four-One. Yeah, let's *fantasize* about that." He blinks aggressively. "I'm not busy, you're not busy, let's just play around!"

links.title: You: ""So what would our relationship be..."
links.text: "So what would our relationship be in this alternate universe?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Let's be crazy... let's say you an..."
links.text: "Let's be crazy... let's say you and I are partners. How's that for a thought experiment?"

links.title: You: ""Like partners in crime, or...?""
links.text: "Like partners in crime, or...?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No!" he exclaims excitedly. "'Caus..."
links.text: "No!" he exclaims excitedly. "'Cause in this thought experiment we are police officers. In a police station. We don't do crimes -- we're not crime bros."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""C'mon, stop it," she says quietly."
links.text: "C'mon, stop it," she says quietly.

links.title: You: ""You seem like a cool guy, I'd love..."
links.text: "You seem like a cool guy, I'd love to have you as my partner."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Would you now?! Or would I be *cra..."
links.text: "Would you now?! Or would I be *cramping your style?*" The man bites his lip, then waves his hand. "Never mind... *partner*."

links.title: You: ""Okay, actually you probably would..."
links.text: "Okay, actually you probably would cramp my style."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh god, I'd hate for that to happe..."
links.text: "Oh god, I'd hate for that to happen... you know what might help prevent that though?"

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You doing your *fucking job*.""
links.text: "You doing your *fucking job*."

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""Me doing my fucking job and not pe..."
links.text: "Me doing my fucking job and not pestering you anymore?"

links.title: You: ""No, you wouldn't cramp my style at..."
links.text: "No, you wouldn't cramp my style at all."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay... how about you stop wasting..."
links.text: "Okay... how about you stop wasting my time and get on with whatever you were doing then?"

links.title: You: ""Actually I shouldn't have called y..."
links.text: "Actually I shouldn't have called you  my partner. Kim's my partner, he's going to know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not your partner." He says qui..."
links.text: "I'm not your partner." He says quickly. "This... this union is temporary."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""A little premonition for you, lieu..."
links.text: "A little premonition for you, lieutenant. Sooner or later -- probably sooner -- your new friend tells you he doesn't need you. He will then suggest you should *fuck off*."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""When that happens I suggest you ta..."
links.text: "When that happens I suggest you take his advice," he adds bitterly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant merely bows his head..."
links.text: The lieutenant merely bows his head in response.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Perfect, great, I don't give a shi..."
links.text: "Perfect, great, I don't give a shit!" He shakes his head. "Now leave us alone and do your thing... and I don't mean get drunk and piss yourself, right? You realize that, don't you?"

links.title: You: ""You seem like a bit of a drag. No..."
links.text: "You seem like a bit of a drag. No offence, but I could do better."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""None taken, my friend -- none take..."
links.text: "None taken, my friend -- none taken." He waves his hands. "Let's be honest, there's been some purely fictional talk in our imaginary station in regards of who'd even *be* worthy of your partnership..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""... and the conclusion is that a m..."
links.text: "... and the conclusion is that a man with your calibre should form his own one-man-policing-unit." He nods eagerly along. "Anyone else would just slow you down."

links.title: You: ""Kim's cooler than you.""
links.text: "Kim's cooler than you."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I'm sure he's fucking *flattered*,..."
links.text: "I'm sure he's fucking *flattered*, but *Kim* is not part of this thought experiment. In this one -- *we're* partners."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is silent."
links.text: The lieutenant is silent.

links.title: You: ""Do *you*... have a crime to solve?""
links.text: "Do *you*... have a crime to solve?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh no, NO, NO! You see, I enjoy wa..."
links.text: "Oh no, NO, NO! You see, I enjoy watching other, better cops solve crimes -- and let me tell you, it's been quite a privilege seeing you work..."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""This isn't helping," she says, sha..."
links.text: "This isn't helping," she says, shaking her head and looking at the man with sunglasses disapprovingly.

links.title: You: ""Who else is in our imaginary polic..."
links.text: "Who else is in our imaginary police station?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You're not going to believe this,..."
links.text: "You're not going to believe this, but..." The man pauses for dramatic effect. "... police officers!"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yes sir, solving crimes, locking u..."
links.text: "Yes sir, solving crimes, locking up bad guys and... *AND* get this... and *not* getting their drink on at two o'clock."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Just some regular boring motherfuc..."
links.text: "Just some regular boring motherfuckers in suits and uniforms. Nothing spectacularly extravagant like you -- the Far Out Son Of Lung."

links.title: You: ""Who is the *Far Out Son of Lung*?""
links.text: "Who is the *Far Out Son of Lung*?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, it's you, you eccentric genius..."
links.text: "Oh, it's you, you eccentric genius." He winks at you sarcastically. "I mean with your unorthodox approach to police work it *has to* be you."

links.title: You: ""Want to tell me more about him? Or..."
links.text: "Want to tell me more about him? Or her?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Not even a little bit.""
links.text: "Not even a little bit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's an urban myth," the lieutenan..."
links.text: "It's an urban myth," the lieutenant says quietly. "About an officer who is so far undercover he can't remember who he is. As I said -- just an urban myth. *You're* not the Son of Lung."

links.title: Empathy: "He's trying to protect you from fur..."
links.text: He's trying to protect you from further rough handling dished out by this sun-glassed man.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Okay, yes -- you get the joke. Leav..."
links.text: Okay, yes -- you get the joke. Leave it at that.

links.title: You: ""I can't imagine it anymore." (Conc..."
links.text: "I can't imagine it anymore." (Conclude.)

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Neither can I, partner. Neither ca..."
links.text: "Neither can I, partner. Neither can I..." His grey eyes suddenly flash above the glass frames. They feel sad.

links.title: Empathy: "It's a mere second, but it feels li..."
links.text: It's a mere second, but it feels like you saw something... a gram of compassion in that sadness.

links.title: You: ""Cool shades. Are you wearing a dis..."
links.text: "Cool shades. Are you wearing a disguise?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yes. It's a hobby of mine." He loo..."
links.text: "Yes. It's a hobby of mine." He looks at you inquisitively.

links.title: Rhetoric: "As if waiting for some kind of reac..."
links.text: As if waiting for some kind of reaction, or response -- something to *click*. It's not happening though. Who is this guy?

links.title: You: ""Kim... who is this guy?""
links.text: "Kim... who is this guy?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mkm." He shakes his head. "I'm not..."
links.text: "Mkm." He shakes his head. "I'm not getting involved in this."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "It's not my style, he thinks, glanc..."
links.text: It's not my style, he thinks, glancing at the man in sunglasses. And the woman beside him. Ooo boy, they're mad at him. No wonder. He just doesn't recognize them.

links.title: You: ""Are you famous or something?""
links.text: "Are you famous or something?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Not as famous as you, superstar."..."
links.text: "Not as famous as you, superstar." He says without the slightest hint of irony.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yeah... it's still irony."
links.text: Yeah... it's still irony.

links.title: You: ""Wait, I'm famous?""
links.text: "Wait, I'm famous?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh yes, big time." He nods enthusi..."
links.text: "Oh yes, big time." He nods enthusiastically. "Who hasn't heard of the Far Out Son of Liver Failure?!"

links.title: You: ""Hold on, who's Son of Liver Failur..."
links.text: "Hold on, who's Son of Liver Failure?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""*Far Out* Son of Liver Failure --..."
links.text: "*Far Out* Son of Liver Failure -- the supercop who voluntarily enters an alcohol induced delirium to solve crimes."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "The woman has a slight smirk on her..."
links.text: The woman has a slight smirk on her face.

links.title: Composure: "She's trying to keep a straight fac..."
links.text: She's trying to keep a straight face.

links.title: Conceptualization: "There's a joke you're not getting h..."
links.text: There's a joke you're not getting here. Could have something to do with the brain damage.

links.title: You: ""Fine.""
links.text: "Fine."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No, not entirely." It's impossible..."
links.text: "No, not entirely." It's impossible to say what his eyes behind the shades are doing.

links.title: You: ""I knew it, Kim! I knew I was a sup..."
links.text: "I knew it, Kim! I knew I was a superstar."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I fear..." The lieutenant lowers h..."
links.text: "I fear..." The lieutenant lowers his voice. "I fear you're misinterpreting this situation."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Talk to me, superstar. What do you..."
links.text: "Talk to me, superstar. What do you want?"

links.title: You: ""I knew it! I knew I was someone we..."
links.text: "I knew it! I knew I was someone well known. A superstar."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Jean, he's obviously suffering..."..."
links.text: "Jean, he's obviously suffering..." The woman stops mid-sentence.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "The man with sunglasses looks at he..."
links.text: The man with sunglasses looks at her -- then back at you: "Okay, superstar. Talk to me, what do you want? You want a pat on the back?"

links.title: You: ""It's happening! My hard work is pa..."
links.text: "It's happening! My hard work is paying off! I'm becoming famous!"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh, yes you are! And you've worked..."
links.text: "Oh, yes you are! And you've worked really, *really* hard, haven't you?"

links.title: You: "There's something strange about thi..."
links.text: There's something strange about this guy. Figure it out.

links.title: You: ""Got some questions for you. I'm a..."
links.text: "Got some questions for you. I'm a cop."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""About *what?* You don't look like..."
links.text: "About *what?* You don't look like a cop..." He inspects you. "You know what you look like?"

links.title: You: ""Like a prophet?""
links.text: "Like a prophet?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Not the prophet shit again..." He..."
links.text: "Not the prophet shit again..." He looks away.

links.title: Authority: "He didn't answer *your* question."
links.text: He didn't answer *your* question.

links.title: Half Light: "Who does this asshole think he is -..."
links.text: Who does this asshole think he is -- a *cop*?

links.title: You: ""Like a revolutionary?""
links.text: "Like a revolutionary?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No, not like a revolutionary." He..."
links.text: "No, not like a revolutionary." He looks away.

links.title: You: ""Like a sack of shit?""
links.text: "Like a sack of shit?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Exactly." The man nods excitedly i..."
links.text: "Exactly." The man nods excitedly in approval.

links.title: You: ""Like a megastar?""
links.text: "Like a megastar?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yes." He nods. "A superstar cop. O..."
links.text: "Yes." He nods. "A superstar cop. Of course. *This* again."

links.title: You: ""Like Guillaume Le...""
links.text: "Like Guillaume Le..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""NO!" The man in the sunglasses rai..."
links.text: "NO!" The man in the sunglasses raises his fist. "You will not start blabbering about that asshole."

links.title: You: ""Like... Kras Mazov?""
links.text: "Like... Kras Mazov?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yeaaah..." He's rubbing his chin a..."
links.text: "Yeaaah..." He's rubbing his chin as he drags out the *yeah*. "Sort of. Okay. I get the reference. Like after he got run over or something."

links.title: You: ""I don't know -- you tell me.""
links.text: "I don't know -- you tell me."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I don't know..." He taps on his fo..."
links.text: "I don't know..." He taps on his forehead, thinking. "A sad stack of shit?"

links.title: You: ""Like a man down on his luck? I'm t..."
links.text: "Like a man down on his luck? I'm trying real hard here, man."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh..." He seems taken aback for a..."
links.text: "Oh..." He seems taken aback for a moment. "Well, go solve your case then. That would count as *trying hard*."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about the hanged man *a..."
links.text: "Let's talk about the hanged man *again*."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay, why not. Let's do the whole..."
links.text: "Okay, why not. Let's do the whole thing over again. We're not wasting time. There *is* no time!"

links.title: You: ""Okay I'm doing this investigation..."
links.text: "Okay I'm doing this investigation -- a man is hanged."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""So... do you know who hanged him?""
links.text: "So... do you know who hanged him?"

links.title: You: ""Not yet.""
links.text: "Not yet."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yeah, I can see that.""
links.text: "Yeah, I can see that."

links.title: You: ""Hey, why am I even telling you thi..."
links.text: "Hey, why am I even telling you this?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I don't know... why are you?" He g..."
links.text: "I don't know... why are you?" He gives you an odd look.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh my god, there's more..." He loo..."
links.text: "Oh my god, there's more..." He looks at you in disbelief. "You want something more... what is it?"

links.title: Logic: "It's like you felt it would be inte..."
links.text: It's like you felt it would be intellectually stimulating -- and would lead somewhere. A custom even? Strange...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who knows why we do the things we d..."
links.text: Who knows why we do the things we do. Somehow bouncing those ideas off the man with sunglasses felt calming. Like you've done it before.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You know what? It must be because h..."
links.text: You know what? It must be because he's *buff*. He looks like he works out like he's got the devil on his back.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'm doing this investigation..."
links.text: "Okay, I'm doing this investigation and it turns out he was shot *and* hanged..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You think he was hanged as a cover..."
links.text: "You think he was hanged as a coverup? To hide the shooting?"

links.title: You: ""Basically -- yes.""
links.text: "Basically -- yes."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay. Well..." He corrects his blo..."
links.text: "Okay. Well..." He corrects his blonde wig. Khm... his hair. He corrects his hair.

links.title: You: ""Hey, why am I telling you this?""
links.text: "Hey, why am I telling you this?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, this person who was shot and..."
links.text: "Okay, this person who was shot and then made to look like he was hanged -- he *might* have been shot by the people who hanged him."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I get it. Okay. But what is the mo..."
links.text: "I get it. Okay. But what is the motive?"

links.title: You: ""To cover something up?""
links.text: "To cover something up?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""That would be my first guess, yes.""
links.text: "That would be my first guess, yes."

links.title: You: ""It's quite possible... hey! Why am..."
links.text: "It's quite possible... hey! Why am I telling you these things?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, the person who was shot and..."
links.text: "Okay, the person who was shot and hanged. He may have been shot by the person who made it look like he was hanged."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""A cover-up -- where the author of..."
links.text: "A cover-up -- where the author of the cover-up is the perp? Makes sense."

links.title: You: ""I know, right? But what's the moti..."
links.text: "I know, right? But what's the motive?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You don't have a motive? Then the..."
links.text: "You don't have a motive? Then the double cover-up seems too neat."

links.title: You: ""Yeah... hey, why am I telling you..."
links.text: "Yeah... hey, why am I telling you these things?"

links.title: You: ""The person who we *think* shot him..."
links.text: "The person who we *think* shot him -- who made it look like he was hanged, that we're looking for -- we can't find her."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Well... where have you looked for..."
links.text: "Well... where have you looked for her?"

links.title: You: ""We think she may be on the coast.""
links.text: "We think she may be on the coast."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""West of here? Though luck. The pla..."
links.text: "West of here? Though luck. The place is ruined from the bombardment. A lot of places to hide there..."

links.title: You: ""Well, yeah... hey, why am I tellin..."
links.text: "Well, yeah... hey, why am I telling you these things?"

links.title: You: ""I have a little problem. The perso..."
links.text: "I have a little problem. The person who was hanged is still hanging there. I still haven't taken him down."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You're not shitting me, Mullen. I..."
links.text: "You're not shitting me, Mullen. I can smell it all the way here. The whole town stinks."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're getting to it... There have..."
links.text: "We're getting to it... There have been complications."

links.title: You: ""Wait -- can *you* maybe help?""
links.text: "Wait -- can *you* maybe help?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""I would love to -- but I'm busy *f..."
links.text: "I would love to -- but I'm busy *fucking off and not cramping your style*. And that might cramp it, you see. Helping you."

links.title: You: ""Hey... why am I even telling you t..."
links.text: "Hey... why am I even telling you these things?"

links.title: You: ""*Now* will you answer some questio..."
links.text: "*Now* will you answer some questions for me?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No," he says calmly, then just kee..."
links.text: "No," he says calmly, then just keeps staring at you.

links.title: You: ""Why not?""
links.text: "Why not?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Cause it's not my job. Why don't y..."
links.text: "Cause it's not my job. Why don't you go and fucking do yours and solve this damn hanging?"

links.title: You: ""If you don't want to answer questi..."
links.text: "If you don't want to answer questions maybe you want to hear me *say things?*"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Actually, I *don't* want to hear y..."
links.text: "Actually, I *don't* want to hear you say things."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""C'mon, Jean...""
links.text: "C'mon, Jean..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay. Say things." He adopts a lig..."
links.text: "Okay. Say things." He adopts a lighter tone. "I want to hear you say things."

links.title: Authority: "Hear that? He wants you to say thin..."
links.text: Hear that? He wants you to say things. Say one!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Suddenly, out of nowhere, case-rela..."
links.text: Suddenly, out of nowhere, case-related things start popping up in your head!

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about something else th..."
links.text: "Let's talk about something else then."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Or...OR..." The man with sunglasse..."
links.text: "Or...OR..." The man with sunglasses raises his index finger. "We could go back to doing our jobs. This was stupid..."

links.title: You: ""Don't you *have* to?""
links.text: "Don't you *have* to?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, he doesn't.""
links.text: "No, he doesn't."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""If I wasn't clinically depressed,..."
links.text: "If I wasn't clinically depressed, I'd burst out laughing." He doesn't look amused. "But I'm gonna go with *no* right now."

links.title: You: ""Fine.""
links.text: "Fine."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "The man in sunglasses nods."
links.text: The man in sunglasses nods.

links.title: You: ""Okay then. See you around!" [Leave..."
links.text: "Okay then. See you around!" [Leave.]

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "Again he provides no reply, instead..."
links.text: Again he provides no reply, instead seemingly trying to get a better look of your attire through his sunglasses.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Good luck, these look darker than w..."
links.text: Good luck, these look darker than welding glasses.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "The man doesn't reply. He's too bus..."
links.text: The man doesn't reply. He's too busy furiously squinting at you.

links.title: Logic: "Trying to get a good picture of you..."
links.text: Trying to get a good picture of your jacket, no doubt.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Can he even see through those glass..."
links.text: Can he even see through those glasses?

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Watch out for yourself, loser!""
links.text: "Watch out for yourself, loser!"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "That voice... so very familiar... D..."
links.text: That voice... so very familiar... Did you hear it when calling to your station and reporting your badge missing?

links.title: You: ""Wait, your voice... I recognize it.""
links.text: "Wait, your voice... I recognize it."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh really?! I wonder where?!""
links.text: "Oh really?! I wonder where?!"

links.title: You: ""I lost my badge recently. When I c..."
links.text: "I lost my badge recently. When I called in to report it missing, you were there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant goes pale. 'No badge..."
links.text: The lieutenant goes pale. 'No badge?' he mouths to himself silently.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "*"That's* where you remember me fro..."
links.text: *"That's* where you remember me from?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. I haven't seen you before.""
links.text: "Yes. I haven't seen you before."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Okay then. It's probably a *coinci..."
links.text: "Okay then. It's probably a *coincidence*. People sound alike. Good bye."

links.title: You: ""Maybe...""
links.text: "Maybe..."

links.title: You: ""Khm... I have a bit of..." (Point..."
links.text: "Khm... I have a bit of..." (Point to you head.) "Memory trouble."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You don't say?" He turns away from..."
links.text: "You don't say?" He turns away from you. "Good bye then. The voice thing was a *coincidence*. Run along, asshole."

links.title: You: "It's probably nothing. [Leave.]"
links.text: It's probably nothing. [Leave.]

links.title: Drama: "He might be wearing a disguise."
links.text: He might be wearing a disguise.

dialogueTree.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You look like shit." Your ruffled..."
dialogueTree.text: "You look like shit." Your ruffled face reflects in the man's sunglasses.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""And I don't mean that as a metapho..."
links.text: "And I don't mean that as a metaphor."

links.title: Conceptualization: "You can't leave it like that -- spi..."
links.text: You can't leave it like that -- spin it on its head. ENGAGE CAPS LOCK.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "No, you don't -- you look like a yo..."
links.text: No, you don't -- you look like a young god.

links.title: You: ""I LOOK LIKE A BURNING SUN.""
links.text: "I LOOK LIKE A BURNING SUN."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Push it more. Harder. Be *more* int..."
links.text: Push it more. Harder. Be *more* intelligent.

links.title: You: ""I mean the likeness of the holy su..."
links.text: "I mean the likeness of the holy sun in the sky. I LOOK LIKE IT."

links.title: You: ""*You* look like shit, asshole!""
links.text: "*You* look like shit, asshole!"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Wow... You seem stable. And in con..."
links.text: "Wow... You seem stable. And in control. Allow me to say, alcohol really seems to have had a positive effect on you."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Now, what do you want?" His tone i..."
links.text: "Now, what do you want?" His tone is impatient.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "There's something about this guy th..."
links.text: There's something about this guy that *matches* with a face in your head. A similar, but different face.

links.title: Logic: "The suit, the sunglasses, the hairc..."
links.text: The suit, the sunglasses, the haircut... he's *famous*. That's how you know his face.

links.title: Composure: "Okay, so this guy is cool -- he sta..."
links.text: Okay, so this guy is cool -- he stands there like a statue. An *angry* statue. And he does *not* like you.

links.title: Suggestion: "Don't even try to win him over. You..."
links.text: Don't even try to win him over. You won't.

links.title: You: ""I don't look like shit!""
links.text: "I don't look like shit!"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Judit," He turns to the woman next..."
links.text: "Judit," He turns to the woman next to him. "Back me up here."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""You do look..." She sighs. "It loo..."
links.text: "You do look..." She sighs. "It looks like it's been a tough week for him."

links.title: You: ""I know, it's intentional.""
links.text: "I know, it's intentional."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Like undercover?" The woman in the..."
links.text: "Like undercover?" The woman in the RCM uniform interjects.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Well, as far as disguises go, this..."
links.text: "Well, as far as disguises go, this is one of the best I've seen... I mean, I could swear you're an actual bum!"

links.title: You: ""The last couple of days have been..."
links.text: "The last couple of days have been rough..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh don't be so modest, we're looki..."
links.text: "Oh don't be so modest, we're looking at several months' worth of damage here. Kind of a miracle you're still up and at it, to be honest..."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""C'mon, Jean..." The woman next to..."
links.text: "C'mon, Jean..." The woman next to him sighs. "It looks like it's been a rough week on him."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""It's not just this week." He scans..."
links.text: "It's not just this week." He scans you from head to toe. "What do you want?"

links.title: You: ""Looks don't matter, it's what's on..."
links.text: "Looks don't matter, it's what's on the inside that does."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yeah, I know -- that's what I'm go..."
links.text: "Yeah, I know -- that's what I'm going by here."

links.title: You: ""I'm never going to get this case s..."
links.text: "I'm never going to get this case solved."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You're not. I really don't believe..."
links.text: "You're not. I really don't believe you are."

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Just flex."
links.text: Say nothing. Just flex.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Oh god... it's the fucking muscle..."
links.text: "Oh god... it's the fucking muscle thing..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "He is secretly admiring your sea of..."
links.text: He is secretly admiring your sea of muscles. Everyone is.
